title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
March 6, 2020
On Friday, March 6, 2020, the President signed into law:H.R. 6074, the “Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2020,” which provides additional fiscal year 2020 emergency supplemental funding for combatting the spread of the coronavirus at the local, State, national, and international levels and to prepare for the impacts that it may have on the Nation.
